privacy.seoDescription: Discover the privacy policy of the Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing website, including information on the collection, use, and protection of your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.responsible:
The controller of the personal data collected on the Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing website is the company Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing, with a share capital of €100,000, registered in the Paris Trade and Companies Register under number 123 456 789.
The Data Protection Officer (DPO) is Mr. Jean Dupont, contactable at the email address admin.jo2024@mail.com.
privacy.dataCollection:
We collect personal data when you use our website, in particular when you create an account, place an order, or contact us.
The collected data may include your name, first name, email address, phone number, and postal address.
We only collect the data necessary for managing your account and providing our services. We do not collect sensitive data such as health information or sexual orientation.
privacy.dataUsage: The personal data we collect is used to manage your account, process your orders, send you information about our products and services, and improve our website. We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. Your data may be shared with our service providers for account management and order processing purposes, but only as part of the provision of our services.
privacy.dataRetention:
We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to manage your account and provide our services.
Order-related data is retained for 10 years from the date of your last order, in accordance with applicable law.
Browsing data and cookies are retained for 13 months in accordance with CNIL recommendations.
Account data is kept as long as your account is active, and then archived for 3 years after deletion.
privacy.dataSecurity:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
Our employees and service providers are required to maintain the confidentiality of your personal data.
privacy.subtitleTransfer: Transfer of Personal Data Outside the EU
privacy.transfer: We do not transfer your personal data outside the European Union. If a transfer is necessary, we ensure that the destination country provides an adequate level of protection or that appropriate safeguards are in place, in accordance with applicable regulations.
privacy.yourRights: Under applicable regulations, you have the right to access, correct, restrict, delete, and object to the processing of your personal data. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at: admin.jo2024@mail.com, attaching a copy of your identity document. You also have the right to set directives regarding the retention, deletion, and communication of your personal data after your death.
privacy.cookies:
You can manage your preferences via the cookie banner and in your browser settings.
We distinguish between necessary cookies for the operation of the site, performance and analytics cookies, and marketing cookies.
Performance and analytics cookies are used to improve the user experience by collecting anonymized data about how you use our site.
Marketing cookies are used to offer you relevant advertisements based on your interests.
privacy.changes:
We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an update date. We encourage you to check this page regularly to stay informed of any changes.
Last updated: May 24, 2025
